text: Arau allahe jiranopakaranata tomalokara majata ijanaka sijanara oparata sraesthatba pradana karaiche. Kintu yisakalaka sraesthatba diya haiche sihamte sihamtara adhinastha dasa-dasisakalaka nijara jiranopakaranara paraa ene paraimane nidiye yate sihamte'o e'i bisaye sihamtara samana hai yaya. Tenehaâ€™le sihamte allahara anugraha asbikara karaene
